sub_title: Digital transformation | Commercial & Customer Experience Leader | People leader
summary:
Experienced business leader with a demonstrated history of working in the consumer, health care and industrial/agri industry. Skilled in Supplier partnerships, (Digital) Marketing, eCommerce and agile product development Management. Strong ability to lead and transform in complex and international environments, whilst keeping the start up mentality of getting things done and keeping performance and employee engagement high. Strong professional with a Bachelor of Science (BS) focused in Business Economics (Marketing & Logistics) from University of Amsterdam. 

Specialties: 
- Logistics & supply chain
- Supplier partnership & sourcing
- Negotiation
- (Digital) Marketing, Ratings & Reviews, Content mgt, Lead mgt
- eCommerce & channel strategy (off-online)
- Retail / trade performance
- Agile transformation
- IT management, agile product development

Speaker at several events and member of several expert groups/events, eg eCommerce Summit Europe, Webwinkel Vakdagen, Expert group Direct Brands, a.o.

Awards won for experience & commerce web performance.

profile_positions.description:
Managing & transforming the digital commerce department (100+) with scope of:
- Online sales performance, 
- Digital Marketing, 
- Digital channel experience [Head of Product], consisting of PO's, UX/UI, CRO and analysts
- Product Data & Content mgt (PIM mgt and digital asset creation) 
- Business Intelligence. 
From scratch build up and implement the strategy to create the best possible customer experience online, generate customer acquisition & conversion and drive insights from data to generate 90% of total sales through online channels.

Main achievements:
- Increase double digit conversion and growth from 70% to 90% online sales, lower acquisition costs and uplift customer satisfaction by more then 10% through building up from scratch a digital marketing team with main capabilities like Search (SEO, SEA, Advertising), Email marketing automation, Content and performance marketing. Grow from 1 to 15 FTE.
- Develop UX vision & proposition, set up product teams through agile and OKR principle resulting in double digit growth in both conversion and customer NPS on site. 
- Lower customer acquisition costs through optimized lead generation maximizing digital marketing, content, automation and offline channels.
- Set up 360 degrees customer insights to drive conversion double digit by collaboration between key account management and digital marketing (multi functional). #datadriven

Achieving this through my servant leadership style, stakeholder management, sharp eye on performance, team spirit and people development ...resulting in a proud :-) employee NPS of 40 and engagement over 80%.
profile_positions.title: Head of eCommerce [digital commerce], Digital Marketing & BI

profile_positions.description:
Global lead eCommerce for Philips defining and implementing the strategy and value proposition to accelerate online sales & loyalty for D2C, online retail and B2B channels (P&L resp.). Focus on:
Retail
- driving rich content experience with our retail partners
- driving leads both online and offline. Ensuring a direct path to purchase.
- Generating ratings & reviews incl insights
- Generating consumer insights from retail analytics 

D2C & B2B Online Shop
- Responsible to create best possible experience to drive Brand, NPS and sales/conversion globally E2E (from awareness to checkout and delivery) through agile product development. [Head of Product]

Key achievements:
- Double digit increase in Rating & Reviews resulting in double digit increase in traffic and conversion.
- Re-platforming to new eCommerce technology & launching 6 new countries
- Global sales increase through owned Online Store >50%
- Implement agile and OKR principle to set up product teams and through experimentation uplift customer experience conversion and NPS double digit. 
- Through data sharing agreement with retailers like Amazon achieve double digit sales growth
profile_positions.title: Global lead eCommerce

profile_positions.description:
Full P&L responsible for Philips Direct Channel and all functions related: sales, marketing, site experience/IT, operations, supply chain and finance. Build the D2C proposition as a start/scale up within Philips and grew eventually in a hundreds of million euro business together with the retail channel as part of the total multi channel strategy.

Responsible for eTrade team managing the global content syndication and lead generation with our retail partners.

Key achievements:
- Install new operating model to decentralize sales under market organizations (as
part of total channel strategy) and implement D2C operations model (incl logistics) with all related capabilities.
- Global sales increase >50% & launch 7 countries
- Increase sales tracking through partner management to measure traffic & campaign
effectiveness (70% traceable leads)
profile_positions.title: General Manager Global Online Philips Store & Director eTrade

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Online Merchandising team to make sure to create an optimal journey for consumers to fulfill their need on the Philips Online Shop with best possible Philips product portfolio and merchandising assets.

Key achievements:
- Sales increase >50%
- Time to market on product activation from 30 to 2 days. 
- Implement business process framework on online merchandising, thereby effectively create content, list and promote products to rfeach a double digit conversion uplift and millions of euros online sales.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Online Sales & Merchandising Manager

profile_positions.description: Trained in Lean Six Sigma methodology and currently working on a Black Belt improvement project within Philips Consumer Lifetsyle
profile_positions.title: Black Belt Project leader

profile_positions.description: Managing the group of 7 purchasing commodity managers and 2 purchasing assistants within the Philips development center for small Domestic Appliances. Responsible for supplier selection/performance during innovation and production/delivery process. Indentifying with innovation team and suppliers the necessary cost savings in order to bring products to market that meet consumer need.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Purchasing Commodity Group Manager

company.name: Philips Consumer Electronics of Suzhou Ltd.

profile_positions.description: responsible for improving the Purchasing function in the Philips production factory for small Domestic Appliances in Suzhou, P.R.C. Installing usage of commodity strategies. Next to this bring significant savings through supplier selection and negotiation.
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Commodity Manager

profile_positions.description: Purchasing responsibility for the commodity Plastics at Philips DAP in Hoogeveen. Development centre for small Domestic Appliances. Responsible for supplier selection and development during product innovation process and regular production process at factory in Poland and China.
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Commodity Manager

profile_positions.description: Understanding the full supply chain and improving key metrics (lead time, stocks etc..) at Philips DAP in Hoogeveen. Development centre for small Domestic Appliances. Production facilities in both Hoogeveen and Poalnd. Managed to improve the flexibilty with key suppliers on fixed planning horizons, lead times and stock keeping.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Supply Chain improvements
